channel.title: Vortigaunt AI
channel.description: While I'm entirely positive that this has been addressed numerous times already, the vort AI is extremely inferior to that of the previous version. To my understanding, their AI was reworked to be more similar to that of the original Half Life, and I believe that this feature should be removed. The vorts functioned perfectly fine in the previous version

item.title: Vortigaunt AI
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Vort AI is a known issue and has already been reported. Please search before posting issues to make sure you’re not duplicating reports and wasting the developers’ time. Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Vortigaunt AI

item.description:
While I’m entirely positive that this has been addressed numerous times already, the vort AI is extremely inferior to that of the previous version.
